attributes.action: Ban the Saudi Arabian Monarch from Britain
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-middle-east-18503550
Man Executed for Sorcery

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Capital_punishment_in_Saudi_Arabia
Wiki Article outlining the use of Capital Punishment

It should also be noted, that Non-Muslims, are not allowed to enter the city of Mecca, We find this discriminatory against any non-muslim, who may be interested in the Islamic faith and it's history, is forbidden from entering the city.
attributes.background: The Saudi Monarch of King Salman, has an awful human rights record. People are executed for Sorcery, Woman are stoned to death for adultery and are banned from driving. If people feel Donald Trump should be banned from the UK for one absurd comment, surely we should ban ACTUAL human rights abusers
